title: Park for kids
review: Motilal Nehru park is a good place to spent evening with family. The garden is very beautiful with lots of beautiful flowers and trees and a sweet green place. Nehru Park is maintained well.

title: Nice Park!!!
review: The Motilal Nehru Park is very nice. We went to the park in the evening. Climate was good. Park is well maintained.

title: Family Tour
review: A famous park & garden of Agra. Very neat & clean, well managed. You will definitely like it. Must visit.

title: Nice park for fun
review: I have come this place many times. Motilal Nehru park is good for morning stroll or having fun with friends or passing time.

title: Motilal Nehru park
review: Wel managed and clean garden in Agra having good collection of tree and flowers enjoy with friends..

title: Nice Park
review: One of the very good and nice park maintained in Agra. We had some good time herewith our group during our trip.

title: Not that Good
review: after seeing Taj mahal and agra fort i feel like there is no other places to look forward in Agra . they look so identical to me

title: Old and famous
review: Motilal nehru is a very famous park of agra. After the information I received from many people, I went here and there I saw a lot of arrangements here. This is a wonderful park. The park is full of flowers and trees.

title: nice park
review: Located just off the Purani Mandi Chauraha, this park is a welcome open space in an otherwise crowded area teeming with tourists as well as locals. Coupled with the Shah Jahan Garden, this green expanse stretches from the Agra Fort to the Taj Mahal and offers great opportunities for leisurely strolls as well as picnics. There is also a golf course close by for enthusiasts.

title: Nice park
review: Nice park, well maintained. Nice to walk around and away from wallahs and air pollution. Pretty big.

title: Waste of time and energy
review: Please do not waste your time and energy going to this place.This has nothing.A place which has disappointed  me to the core.

title: GOOD PARK, EXCELLENT STREET VENDORS
review: I liked the atmosphere of this park, with all its street vendors who offer EVERYTHING you could ever think of (including food)

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Moti lal Nehru garden is very beautiful with lots of beautiful flowers and trees and a sweet green place to enjoy with friends and family.

title: Nice walk and resting place
review: It was a nice walk and resting place, good and clean, very convenient for picnic or spending time with family. Visit during the day requires snacks (but keep clean) and a book!

title: Good to visit this park.
review: Nice Park and place to visit in Agra city tour.

title: Nothing great in this park
review: The park is just a garden. It will be better to spend time at the Agra Fort or Tajmahal then visiting this normal garden. You may find such at your home town also. So dont waste time visiting it.

title: Poor maintainence
review: This park is maintained by Government but it is not nat having good maintainence it is such ahuge park and very old but poor maintainence is killing it

title: GREEN LUNG OF AGRA
review: Located in close proximity to the iconic Agra Fort,this garden is the green lung of Agra,the walled city.Trees,plants,shrubs etc adorn this historic garden said to have been originally conceived by the Moghul Emperors.They say some of the Moghul Emperors would have spent their summer evening in this park relishing the cool evening breeze.Now the park is maintained by the Govt.After the hectic walk around the Agra Fort,we sat in the Garden for an hour enjoying the fresh air of the place.

title: Typically average park
review: There is nothing good about this park. We spent hardly 15 minutes here. It is not well maintained when compared to other good parks in agra.

title: Poor garden in front of agra red fort and taj mahal
review: We should expect a beautiful garden in front of agra red fort. But It is very badly maintained garden, not worth a visit.

title: Evening rest time
review: Motilal nehru park is the good one for spent evening with family..park is maintenaned well..and have same nature scene..good for relaxing after rush day
